page.title: 16HIGHLAND FOLK MUSEUM (2)
page.content:
Highland Regional Council's Museums service is centred at the museum and specialist services in{curatorial and {conservation}work are provided to many of the local smaller museums throughout the Region.
The{IONA GALLERY,}adjacent to the museum, and administered by it, provides a venue for art exhibitions. These include work by local artists as well as touring exhibitions brought in from the Scottish Art Council and other national centres of excellence.
Both the museum and gallery play an important roll in{educational {provision}in Badenoch, with regular visits by primary and secondary pupils. The museum's{photographic {archives}are a resource used by many of the teachers in local schools.
